about_the_game:
Nocturnal Nemesis is a first-person survival horror game where players navigate through eerie environments, solve puzzles, and avoid deadly enemies.

Set in a dark and mysterious winery, players must use stealth and strategy to survive against various nocturnal threats. Each night brings new challenges and horrors that will test your nerves and wits.


Key Features:

• "Atmospheric horror setting with stunning 3D visuals."

• "Engaging story with deep lore and mysteries to uncover."

• "Intense survival mechanics with resource management."

• "Challenging puzzles and stealth-based gameplay."

• "Real-time tactics to outsmart enemies and stay alive."


Please Note: This version of Nocturnal Nemesis is an alpha demo, showcasing the core mechanics and atmosphere. The full game will expand upon these elements with additional content and features. Your feedback is invaluable as we continue development. Thank you for understanding!

content_descriptors.notes:
Nocturnal Nemesis contains mature content primarily centered around horror and suspense elements. The game features:

·	Cartoon/Fantasy Violence: Encounters with various hostile entities that use weapons to attack the player. These confrontations are depicted without gore or blood.

·	Killing: The main character can be killed during these encounters, adding to the game's tension and fear factor.

·	Horror Setting: The game is set in a dark, spooky environment designed to evoke fear. The atmosphere is bleak and designed to create psychological horror.

·	Mild Profanity: Characters use mild profanity such as "stupid" and "idiot."

·	Criminal Acts: The storyline involves unlawful activities, contributing to the overall sense of danger and suspense.

This game does not contain any depictions of sexual acts, extreme violence, drug or alcohol abuse, or self-harm.
